definition: to amass/to accumulate/to store/measured quantity (such as area of volume)/product (the result of multiplication)/to integrate (math.)/to solve (or integrate) an ordinary differential equation (math.)/old/long-standing
ice/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/to chill sth/(of an object or substance) to feel cold/(of a person) cold/unfriendly/(slang) methamphetamine

sentences.english: The ice accretion geometric characteristics have complex effects on airfoil aerodynamic coefficients.
sentences.chinese: 積冰幾何形狀對翼型氣動係數的影響是複雜的。

sentences.english: Radar examinations of the hidden structure below the surface of the grounded ice revealed that the ice streams were not always in their present locations.
sentences.chinese: 雷達檢測積冰內部的結構顯示，冰流的位置並不固定。

sentences.english: Aircraft icing is an important weather phenomenon that can af fe ct the flight safety.
sentences.chinese: 飛機積冰是一種能影響飛行安全的重要天氣現象。

sentences.english: Navigation dangerous on area around the North Pole due to pack ice.
sentences.chinese: 由於多積冰，在北極附近水域航行是危險的。

sentences.english: While the second ice located in Zhongnanshan Shengjing, icing is not year-round.
sentences.chinese: 而太乙冰洞地處終南勝境，洞內積冰更是終年不化。
